spec_data.Name: uzbl
spec_data.Description:
Uzbl is a lightweight web browser based on WebKit/Gtk+.  Uzbl follows
the UNIX philosophy - "Write programs that do one thing and do it
well. Write programs to work together. Write programs to handle text
streams, because that is a universal interface."
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Mon 27 Feb 2017 04:26:27 AM EST, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Lightweight WebKit browser following the UNIX philosophy
